task.title: Setup User Credentials and Euca2ools
task.shortdesc: You must have proper credentials to use client tools (such as Euca2ools) to interact with a Eucalyptus cloud.

context.p: Once you've signed up for a cloud account, your cloud administrator should send you a zip file containing your cloud credentials. This zip file contains an X.509 certificate, as well as a .eucarc file that will set environment variables needed to access your Eucalyptus cloud using the command line tools.
